base.installation_report: Goto to _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/ghost/setup/ and follow the instructions

start.content:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/home/engines/run/pid
export PID_FILE

. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

cd /home/app/ghost


/home/app/node_modules/ghost-cli/bin/ghost start
startup_complete
while ! test -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_term
 do
 sleep 10&
 echo $! > $PID_FILE
 wait
done

/home/app/node_modules/ghost-cli/bin/ghost stop


shutdown_complete

exit

install.content:
#!/bin/sh
cd /home/app

HOME=/home/app/ npm install  ghost-cli@latest

mkdir /home/app/ghost
cd /home/app/ghost

HOME=/home/app/ /home/app/node_modules/ghost-cli/bin/ghost   install --db mysql --dbname $dbname --dbhost $dbhost --dbuser $dbuser --dbpass $dbpasswd --mail smtp --mailhost smtp --mailport 25 --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 9001 --url _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn) local

first_run.content:
#!/bin/sh
 
 cp /home/app/ghost/config.development.json /home/fs/persist/config.development.json
 mv /home/app/ghost/config.development.json /home/app/ghost/config.development.json.bak
 ln -s /home/fs/persist/config.development.json /home/app/ghost/config.development.json
 
 cp -r /home/app/ghost/content /home/fs/persist/
 rm -r /home/app/ghost/content
ln -s /home/fs/persist/content  /home/app/ghost/content
